revised_title: On Definite Integrals in Spherical Harmonic Analysis and Expansion of Potentials of Ellipsoids and Ellipses
tldr: The author investigates definite integrals in spherical harmonic analysis and expands the potentials of ellipsoids and ellipses. The study includes the evaluation of integrals for zonal harmonics, exhaustion of potential energy, and the expansion of potentials for magnetic poles and currents in elliptic circuits.
